sense.name: a recurring event
sense.examples: This television episode is a repeat from last season. John wants to avoid a repeat of his argument with Mary yesterday. The student's repeat of the English class was necessary because he'd flunked it the first time. The disc jockey played Oldies for two hours without any repeats. We're having a repeat of last night's dinner - beer and pizza.

sense.name: a musical passage that is meant to be played again
sense.examples: The score indicates a repeat of the last four measures. The repeat of that motif in the opera is symbolic of death.

sense.name: a recurring decorative design
sense.examples: Mary thinks the wall paper's repeat of floral leaves and vines is too busy looking. The necklace's symmetry was achieved through a repeat of intricate patterns.
